Content.Text:
The guild has already stored as many items as it
can. If you start a Farm Tour now, the oldest
item will be deleted. Continue?

I should get 3 presents ready for the company
I'm expecting.

I should take a present along for the farmer I'm
going to visit.

Yay! I got a present from the farmer who visited
me. The guild is holding on to it for now. I
should go get it later.

Yay! I got a present from the farmer I went to
visit. The guild is holding on to it for now. I
should go get it later.
Connect with people via the internet.
Use the internet to connect with whom?
Close connection and return to the Title Screen.
Open your farm and wait for a visiting farmer.
Look for a farm open to visitors.
Please choose a farm to visit.
Once confirmed, the game will begin.

Waiting for the host farmer to confirm and begin
the game.

You do not have any friends registered on your
friends list. You cannot use this game mode.

Wireless communication is
currently disabled.

Please push the wireless
switch to enable wireless 
communication.

This feature is not available because
the sharing of long text data has
been restricted by Parental Controls.
Connection to the other farmer lost.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What would you like to know?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whom would you like to block?
<RED>※Once blocked, you will be unable to chat with
this person.</RED>

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Block <CHARANAME3>?
<RED>Once blocked, you will be unable to chat with
this person.</RED>

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME3> is now blocked.
<PAGE>
<RED>If you want to reset your blocked-user settings, 
you may do so by going to Data Management in
System Settings, on your Nintendo 3DS system.</RED>

You are currently connected with another
farmer. Are you sure you want to quit?

Use of StreetPass to
communicate with
other users is restricted by
Parental Controls.

During Multiplayer sessions, all participating
players will be able to view the names of each
other's characters, farms, animals, barns, coops
and pet houses. Players can also freely chat
with one another through text and emote icons.
<PAGE>
In Multiplayer, do not send content that is
illegal, offensive, or could infringe the rights of
others. Do not include personal information and
make sure you have obtained all necessary
rights and permissions from third parties.

Sending and receiving chat messages in
Internet multiplayer is restricted by the Online 
Interaction settings of your Nintendo 3DS. 
You can adjust these settings from the Parental
Controls within the System Settings.

Sending and receiving chat messages in
Internet multiplayer is currently disabled. To
enable chat, first set up Online Interaction
within the Parental Controls of your
Nintendo 3DS System Settings.

This feature is restricted by the Online
Interaction settings of your Nintendo 3DS.
You can adjust these settings from the
Parental Controls within the System Settings.

To use this feature, please first set up Online
Interaction within the Parental Controls of
your Nintendo 3DS System Settings.
